title:
Microsoft to partner public, private sector firms in India to close AI 
skills gap, says CEO Satya Nadella
text: The chief executive said Microsoft will provide 2 million people in India with AI skilling opportunities by 2025, through a new ‘ADVANTA(I)GE INDIA’ initiative. This is expected to help close skills gaps across the nation and strengthen India’s posture in the AI-era, as per the statement.
